text: La Pieve is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Calci, province of Pisa. La Pieve is the municipal seat of the municipality of Calci. It is about 13 km from Pisa. == Main sights == * Pieve dei Santi Giovanni ed Ermolao == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: La Pieve, Calci
